tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SLA_monitoring (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    request_id INT,
    request_type VARCHAR,
    current_status VARCHAR,
    sla_deadline TIMESTAMP,
    escalation_priority INT
);

CREATE TABLE SLA_monitoring (
    sla_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    agreement_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Escalation_prioritization (
    escalation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sla_id INT,
    priority_level INT,
    support_team VARCHAR(50),
    escalation_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Escalations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sla_id INT,
    urgency_level INT,
    escalation_contact VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (sla_id) REFERENCES SLAs(id)
);

CREATE TABLE SupportRequests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    request_text TEXT,
    request_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    sla_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sla_id) REFERENCES SLAs(id)
);
